page.title: 09MR. FARNSWORTH A FARMER
page.content:
{ HOW MANY CATTLE HAVE YOU GOT ?{(45)
HOW MUCH MACHINERY HAVE YOU GOT, AND DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE ENOUGH?{(YES) DO YOU HAVE ANY WORKERS TO HELP YOU ? {(YES) HOW MANY BOTTLES OF MILK DO YOU MAKE IN A WEEK?{(1OOO) LITRES. HOW LONG HAVE YOU LIVED IN CROXTON? MR.FARNSWOTH HAS LIVED IN CROXTON {ALL HIS LIFE. DO YOU LIKE LIVING IN CROXTON{?(YES) HOW MANY ACRES OF LAND HAVE YOU GOT ? {(90)ACRES. WHAT MADE YOU START A FARM? {IT WAS ALREADY STARTED GENERATIONS {AGO. HOW MANY HOURS DO YOU WORK ON THE FARM ADAY{ {(12)HOURS.}
